about_the_game:
"

Convocation of the Faithful


Art by: Allen Michael N.  Geneta


Layout by:  Gary N. Hauger

Mythic Portal is proud to bring you another stunning set of Priestly Adventurer tokens for use in any fantasy setting or system. Included are 24 beautifully drawn Elves, Dwarves, Gnomes, Half-Elves, Half-Orcs and even Tieflings, each with four different border variants.
No matter your adventurer or faith needs, Mythic Portal Games has you covered. As always, our tokens are fully compatible with any of our One Minute Maps series! "
